messages.invitation_sent: An invitation was sent. Rights will be set automatically after the user confirms his / her participation in the project.
messages.cannot_remove_admin: Only another gamemaster can remove an author right from you.

obj_id_from.helpText: to invite an user as an organizer to the project, please, invite him / her to your friends first. It protects users from spam.

comment.help_1: If a "gamemaster" right is set, the user will be able to edit only applications within selected filtersets still being able to comment any application
comment.help_2: If a "gamemaster" right is set, only selected sections will be accessable
